means: 非主要的附带项或费用

sentence.Network_en: The discovery was incidental to their main research.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一发现是他们主要研究中的附带收获。

sentence.Network_en: Keep this money for your incidental expenses.
sentence.Network_cn: 这点儿钱,你留着零花吧.

sentence.Network_en: At the bottom of the bill, you will notice various incidental expenses such as faxes.
sentence.Network_cn: 在账单底部，你会发现有传真等各项杂费。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... incident process method 发生过程法 incidental 偶然的 incidental error 偶然误差.
名师丁雪明：2010年考研基础词汇备... ... incidence n. 发生率‖ incidental a. 附带的，偶然的‖ incidentally ad. 附带地，顺便提及.
医学翻译词汇九 ... incidence ① 入射，入射角 ②发生率 incidental 偶发的，非主要的 incident illumination 入射光.
医学翻译词汇九 ... incidence ① 入射，入射角 ②发生率 incidental 偶发的，非主要的 incident illumination 入射光.

list.abs: 会计词汇E ... incidence of taxation 纳税负担 incidental expenses 杂项开支 incidental outlay 附带开支.
Chinese Business Dictionary; An... ... inchoate 空白汇票 incidental damages 附带损失，杂项损失 income 收入，收益，所得.
incident wave 入射波incidental species 偶见种incipient fold 初期褶皱
背诵新概念英语2_英语杂谈_天涯论坛 ... incidental adj. 附带的 incidental music 配乐 issue 争论的事情.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: originally from medieval Latin incidentalis, from Latin incident- 'falling upon, happening to' (from the verb incidere)

entry.def: If one thing is incidental to another, it is less important than the other thing or is not a major part of it.

example.ex: The playing of music proved to be incidental to the main business of the evening...
example.tran: 音乐演奏成了当晚唱主角的商业活动的陪衬。

example.ex: At the bottom of the bill, you will notice various incidental expenses such as faxes.
example.tran: 在账单底部,你会发现有传真等各项杂费。

means.word_mean: 1. (frequently plural) an expense not budgeted or not specified;

sentences.sentence: "he requested reimbursement of $7 for incidental expenses"

means.word_mean: 1. (sometimes followed by `to') minor or casual or subordinate in significance or nature or occurring as a chance concomitant or consequence;

sentences.sentence: "the road will bring other incidental advantages"
"labor problems incidental to a rapid expansion"
"an excessive growth of bureaucracy, with related problems"
"snags incidental to the changeover in management"

means.word_mean: 3. not of prime or central importance;

sentences.sentence: "nonessential to the integral meanings of poetry"- Pubs.MLA

auth_sentence.content: His talk of handbag bonfires isn't completely incidental.
auth_sentence.res_content: His talk of handbag bonfires isn't completely incidental.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His talk of handbag bonfires isn't completely incidental.

auth_sentence.content: The man had some incidental expenses to square away.
auth_sentence.res_content: The man had some incidental expenses to square away.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The man had some incidental expenses to square away.

auth_sentence.content: Operate the department's motor vehicles as an incidental driver.
auth_sentence.res_content: Operate the department's motor vehicles as an incidental driver.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Operate the department's motor vehicles as an incidental driver.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词"人,物,状态"; 2. 地方; 3. 表形容词,"……的"

riv=river+al人,物,状态→竞争

clinic临床+al……的→adj.临床的,病房用的
con共同+gen出生+it+al……的→与生俱来
continent大陆+al……的→adj.大陆的,大陆性的

means.word_mean: 易发生的；偶然发生的；附带发生的；次要的；非有意的

sentences.en: Any resemblance of a character in this book to a living person is purely incidental.
sentences.cn: 书中人物如有雷同，纯属巧合。
